Package es.ull.etsii.Rate

Class EfficientRater

java.lang.Object
es.ull.etsii.Rate.EfficientRater
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rater
public class EfficientRater extends Object implements Rater
The class EfficientRater keeps track of one rater and all their ratings.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Stanislav Rakitov
